```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(googlesheets4)
library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(ggthemes)
library(leaflet)

```


```{r}
# read data
googlesheets4::gs4_auth()

ss <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xzpre5Ej_7OEGRU4EA7KZuMQnSz5YCyTx5Sdbml6bQE/edit#gid=0"
df_main_raw <- read_sheet(ss, sheet = "Main")
geo_locations_raw <- read_sheet(ss, sheet = "locations_coord", range = "B:E")

geo <- geo_locations_raw %>% select(-Comment) %>% rename(Location = Name2)

jobs <- df_main_raw %>% 
  left_join(geo, by = "Location") %>%
  mutate(Country = case_when(
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^1") ~ "SE", 
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^2") ~ "NO",
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^3") ~ "DK"
  )) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Longitude)|!is.na(Latitude))

companies <- jobs %>% 
  group_by(Company, Country) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(Company != "!!!NEW_COMPANY!!!")


#centrera kartan
lon_med <- (max(geo$Longitude)-min(geo$Longitude))/2 +min(geo$Longitude)
lat_med <- (max(geo$Latitude)-min(geo$Latitude))/2 +min(geo$Latitude)



```

hr()

hr()

#Note the use of input$... in the reactive component. 
react_companies <- reactive({
  companies %>% 
    filter(Company %in% input$Company) %>%
    filter(Country %in% input$Country) %>%
    slice_head(n = input$max_companies)
})


react_map <- reactive({
  jobs %>% 
    filter(Company %in% input$Company) %>%
    filter(Country %in% input$Country)

})

### Main requiters
```{r}

renderPlotly({
h2_org <- req(react_companies())


p_Org <- h2_org %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= n, 
             y = reorder(Company,n), 
             fill = Country)) + 
  geom_col(alpha = 0.65) +
  cust_theme+
  facet_wrap(~Country)+
  labs(x= "Nr of new jobs", y = " ")

ggplotly(p_Org, tooltip = "text")
  
}
)

```
> Main reqruiters based on on total number of job adds in all countries.

Time Series
=====================================================

```{r}
library(lubridate)

# Define the starting month
start_month <- as.Date("2023-01-01") 

ads <- df_main_raw %>% 
  mutate(Country = case_when(
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^1") ~ "SE", 
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^2") ~ "NO",
    str_detect(ID, pattern ="^3") ~ "DK"),
    Scrape_date = as.Date(Scrape_date, format = "%Y-%m-%d"), 
    Month = floor_date(Scrape_date, "month")) %>% 
  filter(Month >= start_month) %>% 
  group_by(Month, Country) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  select(Country, Month, n)

p_Ads <- ads %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Month, y = n, color = Country)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Month", y = "Nr of new jobs") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p_Ads, tooltip = "text")

```
